txt_en: Children see magic because they look for it.
txt_cn: 孩子之所以能看到魔法，是因为他们在寻找。

txt_en: Time cures all things.
txt_cn: 时间可抚平一切创伤。

txt_en: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
txt_cn: 你不尝试，就不可能成功。

txt_en: Joy shared with others are more enjoyed.
txt_cn: 与人同乐，其乐无穷。

txt_en: It takes all sorts to make a world.
txt_cn: 世界之大，无奇不有。

txt_en: Be bold. You don't have so many audiences.
txt_cn: 大胆点生活，其实你没有那么多观众。

txt_en: Successful, faster runs my horse in vernal breeze;I've seen within one day all flowers on the trees.
txt_cn: 春风得意马蹄疾，一日看尽长安花。

txt_en: It is never too late to fall in love.
txt_cn: 爱永远不会嫌晚。

txt_en: Remember to bring a little smile every day in this messy life.
txt_cn: 记得在这杂乱的生活里每天带点笑意。

txt_en: When the Cang-lang's waters are clear,I can wash my hat-strings in them.
txt_cn: 沧浪之水清兮，可以濯吾缨。

txt_en: It is worthwhile to travel all over the world.
txt_cn: 遍历山河，人间值得。

txt_en: Image a new story for your life and start living it.
txt_cn: 为你的生命想一个全新剧本，并去倾情出演吧！

txt_en: It's better to burn out than to fade away.
txt_cn: 与其凋零不如燃烧。

txt_en: No man is rich enough to buy back his own past.
txt_cn: 没有人富有到可以赎回自己的过去。

txt_en: Follow your heart, but take your brain with you.
txt_cn: 跟随自己的心，但要保持清醒的头脑。

txt_en: All my love to the dearest father in the world.
txt_cn: 将我全部的爱，献给最亲爱的爸爸。

txt_en: The warmest heart from the best loved ones.
txt_cn: 最暖心的温情来自最爱的人。

txt_en: Friendship is a sheltering tree.
txt_cn: 友情犹如大树，为你遮风挡雨。

txt_en: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
txt_cn: 幸福与否我们自己说了算。

txt_en: I hope we can all be as brave as each other.
txt_cn: 希望我们都能像对方一样勇敢。

txt_en: Shall I compare you to a summer's day?
txt_cn: 我能否将你比作夏天？——莎士比亚

txt_en: There are always people with intentions and romance.
txt_cn: 总有人用心，总有人浪漫。

txt_en: The course of true love never did run smooth.
txt_cn: 通向真爱的路从无坦途。——《仲夏夜之梦》

txt_en: Grasp all, lose all.
txt_cn: 贪得无厌，终将一无所获。

txt_en: A little learning is a dangerous thing.
txt_cn: 一知半解，危险至极。
